definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

sentences.english: What can we do to make those cheese spread lighter and creamier , also low in fat?
sentences.chinese: 怎样才可以做出低脂又美味的起司抹酱呢？

sentences.english: Low-Glycemic-index vegetables are allowed as well as low-fat cheese, nuts, eggs.
sentences.chinese: 低血糖指数的蔬菜被允许以及低脂奶酪，坚果，鸡蛋。

sentences.english: Slice up cucumbers and tomatoes and mix together with a cup of low-fat cottage cheese.
sentences.chinese: 切片黄瓜和西红柿，混合的和低脂松软干酪杯在一起。

sentences.english: Most low-fat yogurts are about 40 calories per 100g.
sentences.chinese: 大多数低脂酸奶每100克约含40卡热量。

sentences.english: If you like, add a dash of low fat milk and a single packet of sugar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢，可以放入少许低脂牛奶或者一小包糖。

sentences.english: Stir in cold milk and light cream at serving time.
sentences.chinese: 待喝时再加入冰牛奶及低脂奶油。

sentences.english: To avoid overfeeding, consider giving your dog low- or reduced-fat dairy products.
sentences.chinese: 为了不至于喂过量，可以考虑使用低脂奶制品。

sentences.english: Adding milk or bread also helps keep the moisture level up for ground protein with low-fat content.
sentences.chinese: 添加牛奶或面包也能够保持低脂蛋白质食物的鲜嫩。

sentences.english: One cube of sugar and low-fat cream, please.
sentences.chinese: 只要一颗糖跟低脂奶精就好。

sentences.english: Use low-fat or nonfat versions of these condiments.
sentences.chinese: 尽量使用低脂或脱脂的上述食品。

sentences.english: At low but not normal levels , adiponectin is nociceptive.
sentences.chinese: 非正常的低脂联素水平是有害的。

sentences.english: Eat more fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, and eat fewer high-fat foods.
sentences.chinese: 多吃水果，蔬菜，五谷杂粮以及低脂食物。

sentences.english: But no study has demonstrated long-term health benefits that can be directly attributed to a low-fat diet.
sentences.chinese: 但并没有研究证实长期的健康直接得利于低脂饮食。

sentences.english: This may indicate that a low-glycemic index could have a protective role in the development of acne.
sentences.chinese: 这也许表明低脂饮食对痤疮的发生具有保护作用。

sentences.english: In fact, according to the quiz, less fattening versions of milk contain 30 milligrams more calcium.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，测试结果证明低脂牛奶含钙量要多30毫克。
